thread.title: Triangle count of a character model

post.author: Code-R
post.body: how many tris are there in characters like voss, strauss and the rest of the rhino squad?

post.author: der_ton
post.body: Most of the character models are in pak003.pk4. Open the .md5mesh model files with a normal text editor, add all the "numtris" values within a .md5mesh (there may be more than one "numtris" line) and you'll get the triangle count.
